title: no panic agency
description: no panic is a digital agency based out of Turin, Italy. They specialize in branding, copyrighting, social media, web and app design. In 2019, they launched their new branding including a new logo, typography, colors, office space and everything in between. It's at this time that I was approached to implement their new website.
summary: Under the art direction of Paolo Pettigiani and the designs of Erik Bovio, I created a new theme for their Wordpress site to replace their existing website. With breathtaking photography, bold typography and a wide range of colors, the new site has to fully encaptures no panic's creative talent and stunning design work. The goal was to create a fun, yet bold experience for no panic's users that would grab their attention and guide them to explore the agency's mission and work. Browsing each page, site visitors can get a taste of the unlimited potential of no panic's creative work.
